title: One Important Thing!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Golden Week is almost here~ Ai-chan, have you decided what you’re gonna do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I’m thinking of giving skateboarding a try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Skateboarding?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! There’s a place in Odaiba where you can try skateboarding~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oh, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>They even lend you all the gear like protectors and stuff~ Wanna join me, Honoka?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I wanna go!! Skateboarding sounds fun to try~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Right? Let’s have a blast together~! But there’s one important thing...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>One important thing...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Don’t cry if you fall!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
